1089435123811057666.Title: The Photographer Of Mauthausen
1089435123811057666.Text: #HolocaustMemorialDay ⁠ ⁠ Francesc Boix, the ' photographer of Mauthausen ' prisoner of the concentration camp. His photographs show the horror and the outbursts of the Holocaust and served as proof of accusation against the Nazis during Nuremberg trial. Via @arxiunacional pic.twitter.com/PLRvsyrMFB

1088786968425701376.Text: 𝐍𝐄𝐖𝐒: Mario is nominated in the category "Best Actor" for his role as Francesc Boix in the movie The Photographer of Mauthausen at the Fotogramas de Plata.
